name: IoticsSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on the bedroom light”
”Alexa, turn off the bedroom light”
”Alexa, Set the level of my hall fan to 5”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: This Iotics smart home skill allows you to control your Iotics Touch Switches. To purchase your touch switch visit - https://www.iotics.io/ and control your fan and lights with simple voice commands.
